channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2023110372
item.description:
Report X-2023110372

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-06T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-16
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023110372, X-2023110373: While screening shipment through xray, found items that looked like dangerous goods. After performing physical search, found flammable and aerosol cans. 3 aerosol cans x 19 ounces 8 flammable liquid bottles x 12 ounces

item.title: Report X-2023110339
item.description:
Report X-2023110339

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-06T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-11
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RSA discovered the Coleman propane cylinder in the Buddy heater. RSA opened the compartment of which the cylinder is attached and found the propane. Shipment cargo cart bumped. The cargo was rescreened via xray here at the warehouse. CSAs discovered an additional two coleman propane cylinders in a black duffle (same AWB).
